body.name: OMBAR Dash Cam 5G WiFi GPS, Dash Cam Front and Inside 4K/2K/1080P+1080P, 64GB Card Included, Dash Camera for Cars with 3.18" LCD Screen, Car Camera with IR Super Night Vision, WDR, G-Sensor, App
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 18 hrs 49 mins
Or fastest pickup Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 17 hrs 49 mins
features: 【4K Dash Cam Front and Inside】OMBAR M570 dashcam monitor the front and inside of your car simultaneously in 4K/2K/1080P+1080P resolution. Never miss a moment with a 170° front, and 150° cabin view. Cabin camera support rotate different angle flexibly. Surveillance coverage of 360° full protection, providing valuable evidence for insurance claims or disputes. Note: Do not plug or unplug the cabin camera during use, disconnect the dashcam's power first before operating.

【Infrared Night Vision】Cabin camera equipped with 6 hidden IR LED lights, makes it possible to record the passenger activity inside the car clearly even in total darkness. This dash camera will automatically adjust exposure to capture clear video footage in low light conditions. Note: Cabin camera will automatically identify the intensity of the light source, if the light source is too weak, the cabin camera's video will still show in black and white even during the day.

【Built-in 5G WiFi, GPS & App Control】The dashcam has built-in Dual-Band WiFi (2.4GHz & 5.0GHz) for faster transfer speed (not support remotely view live on your phone from home, effective WiFi signal range is about 25ft). Free app "Oncam", allowing you to easily control the dash camera, view, download (Support iPhone & Android), or share videos. Internal GPS records your driving route and speed. Note: cannot be used as GPS navigation.(GPS Player download please contact us by your Amazon order)

【Reliable Witness for Accident】With 64G TF card provided(inserted), dashcam won't lose any crucial evidence with loop recording, max up to 256GB (Must formate the SD card before first-time use); G-sensor auto detect a collision and lock the file to prevent that from an overwrite; Built-in super capacitor (without battery), allow withstand extreme temperatures from -4°F to 158°F, the working temperature of dashcam is 30℃ to 50℃, so it is normal for your dash camera to run slightly hot.

【2 Parking Modes for 24/7 Protection】Time-Lapse 1fps Parking Mode: The car camera will keep recording continuously at one frame per second rate to ensure maximum recording quantity; Collision Detection Parking Mode: Allows the car camera to automatically initiate recording for 1min when G-sensor is triggered by a collision. Note: 24Hrs parking monitor require the 3-Lead Hardwire Kit(Not included in the package, ASIN: B0BNPWTSBH).

【Warranty & Support】OMBAR 4K dash cam front and inside must be powered by cigarette lighter port, so it comes with wires(must ALWAYS connect with power when using). Note: Wi-Fi doesn't mean wireless, only for connection between your phone with dashcam when you need to view videos by phone. The dash camera comes with a full 12 months warranty, if you have any question regarding your product, please do not hesitate to contact us via Amazon, after-sale service is 7/24 on standby.

What are the advantages of 5G WiFi? For 4K dash cam, 2.4G wifi could not meet requirements, the transmission speed of 5G is about 2-4 times that of 2.4G, up to 10MB/s What is the difference between H.265 and H.264? The main difference is that HEVC (H.265) allows for further reduced file size. H.264 (AVC) can be chosen for compatibility with older desktop and mobile devices. We recommend VLC Media Player on PC to play videos. How to use parking monitoring function? Do I have to buy a separate hardwire kit? Yes, parking monitoring function require the hardwire kit and protect the car battery from depleting. Hardwire kit is not included, you need to buy it separately (Asin: B0BNPWTSBH). Is normal for my dash cam to get hot? OMBAR 570 allow withstand extreme temperatures from -4°F to 158°F(-20°-70°), the normal working temperature is about 30℃ to 50℃, so it is normal for your dash camera to run slightly hot, especially in 4K recording. What should I pay attention to when using it for the first time? Pls tear off all protective film before using the dash cam for the first time. You MUST formate the SD card before the first-time use. Pls ALWAYS connect with power when using as it is built in Super Capacitor(without battery).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A dashcam that solves all needs in the car for that extra layer of evidence!
reviews.reviewText: Got this to use in our truck. These are small in size and do the job very well of a dash camera. Satisfactory performance at this price point.Things I like about this product:- Functional product overall with both front and rear cameras- Decent picture/video quality with 4k capability with good field of view- Screen has minimal buttons and it is easy to use- Navigation is smooth on the display- Connects to phone app through WiFi to access and control the camera remotely- They do include a nice embedded mount in the package for the camera- Comes with 64 GB SD loaded to the camera- All needed accessories are included in the bundle- 12 month long warranty includedThings that need improvement:- I would not mind to have a larger screenOverall take: For the price and the size of the camera, it is a value for the money and I would recommend these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stunning and Sturdy Dash Cam - Go for it!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this Dash Cam, but it has truly exceeded my expectations. The sleek design seamlessly blends into my car's interior, and the installation was easy. The video quality is crystal clear, capturing every detail on the road.The night vision feature is very impressive. It automatically starts recording when I turn on the ignition, providing a continuous loop of footage. The G-sensor is a valuable addition, saving important clips in case of sudden stops or collisions.The menu is very friendly which easily allow to access the settings and playback. I appreciate the loop recording function, eliminating the need to manually manage storage and the parking monitor feature let you live at ease not to worry about the car at the parking anytime.The build quality feels robust, and the adhesive mount holds the dash cam securely in place. Additionally, the included app allows me to conveniently view and download footage on my phone.In summary, this Ombar Dash Cam offers reliability, impressive features, and peace of mind on the road. It's a worthwhile investment for anyone seeking a trustworthy and user-friendly dashboard camera for your car.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exceptional Performance and Features - A Top-Notch Dash Cam!
reviews.reviewText: The OMBAR Dash Cam Front and Rear exceeded my expectations, delivering an outstanding performance that truly stands out in the crowded dash cam market. This feature-packed device has become an essential part of my daily commute, providing peace of mind with its advanced capabilities.The 5G WiFi connectivity ensures seamless video streaming and quick file transfers, making it a breeze to access and share footage. The dual-camera setup, offering 4K/2K/1080P+1080P resolution, captures crystal-clear video quality both in front and behind the vehicle. The 3.18" LCD screen is large enough for easy navigation through settings and playback.One of the standout features is the WDR Night Vision, which delivers exceptional clarity in low-light conditions. The footage is crisp, detailed, and offers a reliable record of events, day or night. The build quality is robust, and the dash cam feels durable and well-made.Installation was straightforward, and the user-friendly interface made it easy to customize settings to my preference. The loop recording feature ensures that I never miss a moment, and the G-sensor automatically saves critical footage in the event of an impact.In summary, the OMBAR Dash Cam is a top-notch investment for anyone looking to enhance their road safety and document their journeys. With its impressive video quality, WiFi capabilities, and reliable night vision, this dash cam earns a well-deserved 5 stars. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dash cam
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this Dash Cam for about a week and so far I am very pleased. Installation was tedious as expected for any front & rear dash cam, but I was pleased to see the product came with a tool which made it much easier to tuck in and hide wires. Easy to install. Small and unobtrusive - not an issue at all after installing it on the windshield below my mirror. Immediately connects to my phone every time I start my car. Creates great videos and easy to download a video directly to my phone if needed. Will recommend to anyone who looking for a new dash cam.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High-Quality and Feature-Rich Dash Cam
reviews.reviewText: This dash cam has been an excellent addition to my vehicle. The 5G WiFi and GPS functionalities make it incredibly convenient to use. The video quality, both front and inside, is outstanding with options for 4K, 2K, and 1080P resolutions. It provides clear footage, which is essential for any road incidents. The installation was straightforward, and the camera's design is sleek, not obstructing my view. The added security and peace of mind this dash cam provides, with its accurate GPS tracking and high-quality recordings, make it a top choice for any driver.
